original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, votes as v, posts as p WHERE ph.PostId = p.Id AND c.PostId = p.Id AND v.PostId = p.Id AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.PostId=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E3.PostId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3E4.PostId=E2.PostId)
